props.backgroundColor: Changes the background-color for the component.
props.dense: Reduces the button size and padding.
props.group: Generally used in [v-toolbar](/components/toolbars) and [v-app-bar](/components/app-bars). Removes background color, border and increases space between the buttons
props.shaped: Applies a large border radius on the top left and bottom right of the card.

exposed.select: Selects a button by index, the second parameter is a boolean to indicate if the button should be selected or not
